channel.title: Server Creation Sum-Up
channel.description:
Just want to clairify the steps as of how to make a server and bring it online...
1. Download Java JDK (I have Java JDK 6 Update 5.) 2. Set PATH and CLASSPATH enviorment variables. 3. Get a source and edit it. 4. Get a no-ip address. 5. Port foward. 6. Run server. 7. Logon to it via the no-ip address on either a web client OR a home make client.
Is this correct and will it work?

item.title: Server Creation Sum-Up
item.dc:creator: @Schedin Schedin
item.description:
@Schedin wrote:

Just want to clairify the steps as of how to make a server and bring it online…

  1. Download Java JDK (I have Java JDK 6 Update 5.)
  2. Set PATH and CLASSPATH enviorment variables.
  3. Get a source and edit it.
  4. Get a no-ip address.
  5. Port foward.
  6. Run server.
  7. Logon to it via the no-ip address on either a web client OR a home make client.

Is this correct and will it work?

Read full topic
